title: November Events at Chesterbrook Academy Columbia: A Heartwarming Success | FinancialContent Business Page
text:
Columbia, SC - Chesterbrook Academy celebrated a month filled with connection, learning, and giving back, making November a truly memorable time for students, families, and staff. From engaging activities to impactful community initiatives, the school embraced the spirit of togetherness and gratitude throughout the month.
Fostering Gratitude and Kindness
November began with a commitment to nurturing gratitude and kindness among students. Activities, guided by Chesterbrook Academy’s Links to Learning curriculum , inspired personal sharing and an appreciation for giving back, laying the foundation for a month dedicated to community and cultural awareness.
A Season of Giving
Chesterbrook Academy’s annual Holiday Giving initiative took center stage with a school-wide Food Drive supporting Harvest Hope Food Bank. The students and their families came together to make a difference, collecting much-needed items for those in need. Students learn the value of generosity and the impact of their actions.
Celebrating Native American Heritage Month
November was also a time to honor Native American culture, accomplishments, and traditions. Classrooms buzzed with engaging activities such as reading books about Native Americans, making traditional meals, and exploring nature — a cornerstone of Native American heritage.
Thanksgiving Festivities and Parade
The school’s Thanksgiving Parade on November 22 brought families together for a joyful celebration. Students showcased their creativity and festive spirit in a lively display of gratitude and holiday cheer. Leading up to the event, classrooms were filled with Thanksgiving-themed activities, creating unforgettable memories for all involved.
Excitement for STEM and Civic Engagement
Highlights of the month also included National STEM Day on November 8, where students participated in hands-on learning that fostered critical thinking and innovation, as well as Intermediate and Pre-K Mock Elections on November 5, where young learners explored the importance of civic responsibility.
Looking Ahead
As the school wraps up November, Chesterbrook Academy extends its gratitude to the families and community members who contributed to this month’s successes. Students grow academically, socially, and emotionally, especially during a season that emphasizes gratitude and togetherness.
Chesterbrook Academy looks forward to continuing its mission of fostering a love for learning, community connection, and cultural appreciation as it heads into the holiday season.
About Chesterbrook Academy Columbia, SC
Chesterbrook Academy in Columbia, SC provides a warm and nurturing environment where children thrive through hands-on learning and community engagement. Committed to fostering academic excellence and personal growth, Chesterbrook Academy preschool prepares students for lifelong success.
